name: Converto
tagline: App for this guy who always forget to change the language in his keyboard
body:
### Converto is a thing..
Many of you - and me - always forget to change the keyboard , then after writing a 10 lines post we just be "Damn! I forgot the Alt+Shift" then you erase and write again..
We developed this app to avoid this problem, and instantly fix your mistyped text to the correct language.

### Goal from app..
To overcome one of the most common problems that face arabic-english users, and they never say that "Damn!" again.

By Using converto you will experience one of the blessings of technology.. making your everyday life easier.


### Functionality & Features :
**Converto is :**
* Cross Platform : no matter what your PC runs, you can use Converto.

* Multi Lingual : coded in python, java and vb.net to provide many solutions for users with one of them not installed.

* Easy to use : no installation or anything, use out-of-box.

* Open source : everyone can contribute to development.

**Converto Can :**
* Change mistyped English characters to Arabic.

* Change mistyped Arabic characters to English.


### Downloads :

* Windows EXE version [Recommended]: <http://d-h.st/>

* Python GUI version : <http://d-h.st/mN5E>

* Python console version : <http://d-h.st/UU0a>

* Java console version : <http://d-h.st/yeHJ>
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
